verses.verse: וָאָשֻׁ֗ב <WH7725> And I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> and lifted up עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> four מַרְכָּבוֹת֙ <WH4818> chariots יֹֽצְא֔וֹת <WH3318> out מִבֵּ֖ין <WH996> between שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> from between two הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> mountains וְהֶהָרִ֖ים <WH2022> and the mountains הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> [were] mountains נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> of brass

בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <WH4818> chariot הָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> In the first סוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> horses אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <WH122> [were] red וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <WH4818> chariot הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> and in the second סוּסִ֥ים <WH5483> horses שְׁחֹרִֽים׃ <WH7838> black

וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <WH4818> chariot הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <WH7992> And in the third סוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> horses לְבָנִ֑ים <WH3836> white וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָה֙ <WH4818> chariot הָרְבִעִ֔ית <WH7243> and in the fourth סוּסִ֥ים <WH5483> horses בְּרֻדִּ֖ים <WH1261> grisled אֲמֻצִּֽים׃ <WH554> and bay

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <WH6030> Then I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> unto the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֑י מָה־ <WH4100> What אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> master

וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> And the angel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> unto me These [are] the four רֻח֣וֹת <WH7307> spirits הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heavens יוֹצְא֕וֹת <WH3318> which go forth מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> from standing עַל־ <WH5921> before אֲד֥וֹן <WH113> before the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of all the earth

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which בָּ֞הּ הַסּוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> horses הַשְּׁחֹרִ֗ים <WH7838> The black יֹֽצְאִים֙ <WH3318> which [are] therein go forth אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> into the north וְהַלְּבָנִ֔ים <WH3836> and the white יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> go forth אֶל־ <WH413> about אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after וְהַ֨בְּרֻדִּ֔ים <WH1261> them and the grisled יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> go forth אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country הַתֵּימָֽן׃ <WH8486> toward the south

וְהָאֲמֻצִּ֣ים <WH554> And the bay יָצְא֗וּ <WH3318> went forth וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <WH1245> and sought לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> that they might walk to and fro לְהִתְהַלֵּ֣ך <WH1980> walk to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> through the earth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and he said לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> So they walked to and fro הִתְהַלְּכ֣וּ <WH1980> patrol בָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> through the earth וַתִּתְהַלַּ֖כְנָה <WH1980> patrolled בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> through the earth

וַיַּזְעֵ֣ק <WH2199> Then cried אֹתִ֔י <WH854> to me וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> me and spake אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto me saying רְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> Behold הַיּֽוֹצְאִים֙ <WH3318> these that go אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> toward the north הֵנִ֥יחוּ <WH5117> have quieted אֶת־ <WH853> he upon רוּחִ֖י <WH7307> my spirit בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> in the north ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

לָק֙וֹחַ֙ <WH3947> Take מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> of [them of] the captivity מֵחֶלְדַּ֕י <WH2469> [even] of Heldai וּמֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <WH2900> of Tobijah וּמֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <WH3048> and of Jedaiah וּבָאתָ֤ <WH935> which are come אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> thou the same day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> the same וּבָ֗אתָ <WH935> and come בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> into the house יֹאשִׁיָּ֣ה <WH2977> of Josiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son צְפַנְיָ֔ה <WH6846> of Zephaniah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> and go מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> from Babylon

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> Then take כֶֽסֶף־ <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and gold וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> and make עֲטָר֑וֹת <WH5850> crowns וְשַׂמְתָּ֗ <WH7760> and set בְּרֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> [them] upon the head יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> of Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹצָדָ֖ק <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> the high

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <WH559> And speak אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto him saying כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> Behold the man צֶ֤מַח <WH6780> [is] The BRANCH שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> whose name וּמִתַּחְתָּ֣יו <WH8478> where יִצְמָ֔ח <WH6779> and he shall grow up וּבָנָ֖ה <WH1129> out of his place and he shall build אֶת־ <WH853> הֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> who יִבְנֶ֞ה <WH1129> Even he shall build אֶת־ <WH853> הֵיכַ֤ל <WH1964> the temple יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> who יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> and he shall bear ה֔וֹד <WH1935> the glory וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> and shall sit וּמָשַׁ֖ל <WH4910> and rule עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֑וֹ <WH3678> upon his throne וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will be a כֹהֵן֙ <WH3548> and he shall be a priest עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> upon his throne וַעֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> and the counsel שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> of peace תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בֵּ֥ין <WH996> will be between שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> shall be between them both

וְהָעֲטָרֹ֗ת <WH5850> And the crowns תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> will become לְחֵ֙לֶם֙ <WH2494> shall be to Helem וּלְטוֹבִיָּ֣ה <WH2900> and to Tobijah וְלִידַֽעְיָ֔ה <WH3048> and to Jedaiah וּלְחֵ֖ן <WH2581> and to Hen בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְפַנְיָ֑ה <WH6846> of Zephaniah לְזִכָּר֖וֹן <WH2146> for a memorial בְּהֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וּרְחוֹקִ֣ים ׀ <WH7350> And they [that are] far off יָבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> shall come וּבָנוּ֙ <WH1129> and build בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will take אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> me unto you And [this] shall come to pass if ye will diligently תִּשְׁמְע֔וּן <WH8085> obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God ס
